actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to reclassify extracorporeal shock wave lithotripters.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to exclude extracorporeal shock wave lithotripters with respect to the duty treatment of electro-surgical apparatus.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to reclassify extracorporeal shock wave lithotripters.
